title: Kennen getting a new skin.
body: Well I main kennen and i think that he should get a new skin, I like the arctic ops kennen but i think a new skin for him would be great for all of us kennen players :D.

replies.body: We thought Kennen needed a new skin, too! Blood Moon Kennen just hit PBE! :D
I can't wait for it to come to regular so that i can get it sense i am not PBE ;-;

No! Wallet, Stop! We don't even own Kennen!

Please Wallet! We need that money to live! Don't do it!

Agreed, as a fellow Kennen main - I'd love to see a skin that does more with his particles and provides him a more updated look.

Would be excellent to see and I hope he gets a new skin soon! :)
